params.text: Uxoxo wayethanda ukubheka izinkanyezi. Wayefuna ukugxuma phezulu azithinte. Ngobunye ubusuku, wayezimisele ukuthinta izinkanyezi!
Wagibela idwala elikhulu futhi wafinyelela kuzo. Kodwa zazingafinyeleleki. Izinkanyezi zazikude KAKHULU!
Khona–ke, wabona sokwelusa umhlamba. Phezulu wakhuphuka. Welula izandla zakhe, kodwa izinkanyezi zazingakafinyeleleki.
Uxoxo wabona umuthi kakhukhunathi eduze. Wawumude kakhulu. Ah, wayecabanga ukuthi lokhu kuzosebenza manje.
Waqala ukugibela umuthi. Wakhuphuka ngobunzima obukhulu.
Welula izandla zakhe... kodwa izinkanyezi zazisangafinyeleleki.
Waphoxeka. Wabheka phansi. Inhliziyo yakhe yeqa ukushaya ngokwesaba.
Wabeka isandla enhliziyweni yakhe wazitshela ukuthi, "Ngeke ngesabe. Ngingakwenza!"
Wabe esebona ichibi. Izinkanyezi zaziqhakaza emanzini.
Wabheka izinkanyezi futhi wajabula. Wajula echibini.
Lapho esondela echibini, wabonakala esondela ezinkanyezini.
Gxumu! Washaya phezu kwamanzi.
Waphuma wahlala ebhange.
Wahlala wabuka izinkanyezi ziqhakaza echibini.

“Isifiso Sexoxo senkanyezi” credits

This work, “Isifiso Sexoxo senkanyezi” is a derivative of Frog's Starry Wish is translated by Alisha Berger. The © for this translation lies with Room to Read, 2016. Based on Original story: by Sheesh Pal. © Room to Read , 2016. Some rights reserved.

“Isifiso Sexoxo senkanyezi” is licensed under CC BY 4.0 by Curious Learning.

 

Book builder - Abraham Jerry Kakooza
